name: Overhunt
description:
In the near future, various factions fight for control over the galaxy. on the way back from a standard freight trip, your entire fleet is bombed leaving you, and you alone to fight against the opposition. Think you have what it takes to survive?

Find out now in the ultimate blend of an 8-bit classic and next gen physics that is OVER HUNT.

Loving the soundtrack?

Music by:

EDMA and CPL - Available on soundcloud
